name: internet-drum-pattern-queue-server-spec
description: The specification for a remote API ingesting and serving internet drum patterns.

scripts.test: node ./node_modules/yaml-lint/cli.js --schema=FAILSAFE_SCHEMA internet-drum-pattern-queue-server-spec.yaml && node ./node_modules/lintspaces-cli/index.js -n -t -l 2 -d spaces ./internet-drum-pattern-queue-server-spec.yaml && node ./node_modules/speccy/speccy.js lint -r strict internet-drum-pattern-queue-server-spec.yaml

author: Piet van Dongen
